title: Hextech Crafting Worlds Golden Kha Chroma
body: Just wondering if anyone else is having the problem where you cant craft the golden kha chroma, if anyone knows how to it please teach me how

replies.body: i also cant forge the golden chroma of tresh , the client informed me that it fails when i clicked the forge button, and also i have had the skin of champion tresh and 400 tokens, its very strange. Have your problem been solved yet?
Do you have 400 tokens? If not, you'll need to earn 400 tokens before you can craft it.
